:::{#hero-heading}

I am a Postdoctoral Researcher in the Department of Mathematics at  [ULisboa](https://www.ulisboa.pt/), working under the supervision of [Bruno Loff](https://brunoloff.wordpress.com/) on the Hardness of Finding Good Algorithms ([HoFGA](https://brunoloff.wordpress.com/hofga/)) project. I am also a member of [LASIGE](https://lasige.pt/), a research unit at the Faculty of Sciences, University of Lisbon ([FCUL](https://ciencias.ulisboa.pt/)).

I obtained my PhD from Tata Institute of Fundamental Research ([TIFR](https://www.tifr.res.in/)), Mumbai, under the guidance of [Prahladh Harsha](https://www.tcs.tifr.res.in/~prahladh/).

<!-- I earned my Bachelor's and Master's degrees from Chennai Mathematical Institute (CMI), during which I also attended courses at the Institute of Mathematical Sciences (IMSc), Chennai.
